note: Born in Canada, Professor Card obtained his B.A. at Queen’s University, Kingston, Ontario, and his Ph.D. at Princeton University. He has received many honors, the most notable of which is the Amer­ ican Economic Association’s John Bates Clark Prize, awarded to the best economist under 40.
title: DAVID CARD is Class of 1950 Professor of Economics and Director of the Center for Labor Economics at the University of California, Berkeley, and Faculty Research Associate at the National Bureau of Economic Research
